name: Simple Google Maps Widget
author: Google Maps team

sections.description:
Simple Google Maps Widget

  • Simple Google Maps Widget

The title is optional but good to have if you use multiple map widgets on your site. There is also a cool feature, where you can insert a snippet of information about the location of your choice in the widget and it’ll show the snippet when you click on your map location marker.

Note that you should have a valid and one specific API key for each widget in order to get the map to work. But, don’t worry, just follow the steps in this article to set up an API key for your map widget. Then, insert it into the API Key field in the widget and you have a working map widget with minimal steps.

The widget options are as follows:
– Title (Optional)
– API Key (Necessary)
– Location (Recommended)
– Latitude (optional)
– Longitude (optional)
– Marker Title (Necessary)

If you want to have a minimal but a good map widget with minimal but powerful options, then this widget is for you.

Don’t forget, in case of any problems or questions, feel free to contact us via e-mail at info@ays-pro.com.

short_description: A simple yet cool and intuitive Google maps widget for your website
